82  /**
83   * A Store data file.  Stores usually have one or more of these files.  They
84   * are produced by flushing the memstore to disk.  To
85   * create, instantiate a writer using {@link StoreFile#WriterBuilder}
86   * and append data. Be sure to add any metadata before calling close on the
87   * Writer (Use the appendMetadata convenience methods). On close, a StoreFile
88   * is sitting in the Filesystem.  To refer to it, create a StoreFile instance
89   * passing filesystem and path.  To read, call {@link #createReader()}.
90   * <p>StoreFiles may also reference store files in another Store.
91   *
92   * The reason for this weird pattern where you use a different instance for the
93   * writer and a reader is that we write once but read a lot more.
94   */
95  public class StoreFile extends SchemaConfigured {
96    static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(StoreFile.class.getName());
97  
98    public static enum BloomType {
99      /**
100      * Bloomfilters disabled
101      */
102     NONE,
103     /**
104      * Bloom enabled with Table row as Key
105      */
106     ROW,
107     /**
108      * Bloom enabled with Table row & column (family+qualifier) as Key
109      */
110     ROWCOL
111   }
112 
113   // Keys for fileinfo values in HFile
114 
115   /** Max Sequence ID in FileInfo */
116   public static final byte [] MAX_SEQ_ID_KEY = Bytes.toBytes("MAX_SEQ_ID_KEY");
117 
118   /** Major compaction flag in FileInfo */
119   public static final byte[] MAJOR_COMPACTION_KEY =
120       Bytes.toBytes("MAJOR_COMPACTION_KEY");
121 
122   /** Major compaction flag in FileInfo */
123   public static final byte[] EXCLUDE_FROM_MINOR_COMPACTION_KEY =
124       Bytes.toBytes("EXCLUDE_FROM_MINOR_COMPACTION");
125 
126   /** Bloom filter Type in FileInfo */
127   public static final byte[] BLOOM_FILTER_TYPE_KEY =
128       Bytes.toBytes("BLOOM_FILTER_TYPE");
129 
130   /** Delete Family Count in FileInfo */
131   public static final byte[] DELETE_FAMILY_COUNT =
132       Bytes.toBytes("DELETE_FAMILY_COUNT");
133 
134   /** Last Bloom filter key in FileInfo */
135   private static final byte[] LAST_BLOOM_KEY = Bytes.toBytes("LAST_BLOOM_KEY");
136 
137   /** Key for Timerange information in metadata*/
138   public static final byte[] TIMERANGE_KEY = Bytes.toBytes("TIMERANGE");
139 
140   /** Key for timestamp of earliest-put in metadata*/
141   public static final byte[] EARLIEST_PUT_TS = Bytes.toBytes("EARLIEST_PUT_TS");

143   // Make default block size for StoreFiles 8k while testing.  TODO: FIX!
144   // Need to make it 8k for testing.
145   public static final int DEFAULT_BLOCKSIZE_SMALL = 8 * 1024;

147   private final FileSystem fs;
148 
149   // This file's path.
150   private final Path path;
151 
152   // If this storefile references another, this is the reference instance.
153   private Reference reference;
154 
155   // If this StoreFile references another, this is the other files path.
156   private Path referencePath;
157 
158   // If this storefile is a link to another, this is the link instance.
159   private HFileLink link;
160 
161   // Block cache configuration and reference.
162   private final CacheConfig cacheConf;
163 
164   // What kind of data block encoding will be used
165   private final HFileDataBlockEncoder dataBlockEncoder;
166 
167   // HDFS blocks distribution information
168   private HDFSBlocksDistribution hdfsBlocksDistribution;
169 
170   // Keys for metadata stored in backing HFile.
171   // Set when we obtain a Reader.
172   private long sequenceid = -1;
173 
174   // max of the MemstoreTS in the KV's in this store
175   // Set when we obtain a Reader.
176   private long maxMemstoreTS = -1;
177 
178   public long getMaxMemstoreTS() {
179     return maxMemstoreTS;
180   }
181 
182   public void setMaxMemstoreTS(long maxMemstoreTS) {
183     this.maxMemstoreTS = maxMemstoreTS;
184   }
185 
186   // If true, this file was product of a major compaction.  Its then set
187   // whenever you get a Reader.
188   private AtomicBoolean majorCompaction = null;
189 
190   // If true, this file should not be included in minor compactions.
191   // It's set whenever you get a Reader.
192   private boolean excludeFromMinorCompaction = false;
193 
194   /** Meta key set when store file is a result of a bulk load */
195   public static final byte[] BULKLOAD_TASK_KEY =
196     Bytes.toBytes("BULKLOAD_SOURCE_TASK");
197   public static final byte[] BULKLOAD_TIME_KEY =
198     Bytes.toBytes("BULKLOAD_TIMESTAMP");
199 
200   /**
201    * Map of the metadata entries in the corresponding HFile
202    */
203   private Map<byte[], byte[]> metadataMap;
204 
205   /**
206    * A non-capture group, for hfiles, so that this can be embedded.
207    * HFiles are uuid ([0-9a-z]+). Bulk loaded hfiles has (_SeqId_[0-9]+_) has suffix.
208    */
209   public static final String HFILE_NAME_REGEX = "[0-9a-f]+(?:_SeqId_[0-9]+_)?";
210 
211   /** Regex that will work for hfiles */
212   private static final Pattern HFILE_NAME_PATTERN =
213     Pattern.compile("^(" + HFILE_NAME_REGEX + ")");
214 
215   /**
216    * Regex that will work for straight reference names (<hfile>.<parentEncRegion>)
217    * and hfilelink reference names (<table>=<region>-<hfile>.<parentEncRegion>)
218    * If reference, then the regex has more than just one group.
219    * Group 1, hfile/hfilelink pattern, is this file's id.
220    * Group 2 '(.+)' is the reference's parent region name.
221    */
222   private static final Pattern REF_NAME_PATTERN =
223     Pattern.compile(String.format("^(%s|%s)\\.(.+)$",
224       HFILE_NAME_REGEX, HFileLink.LINK_NAME_REGEX));
225 
226   // StoreFile.Reader
227   private volatile Reader reader;
228 
229   /**
230    * Bloom filter type specified in column family configuration. Does not
231    * necessarily correspond to the Bloom filter type present in the HFile.
232    */
233   private final BloomType cfBloomType;
234 
235   // the last modification time stamp
236   private long modificationTimeStamp = 0L;
237 
238   /**
239    * Constructor, loads a reader and it's indices, etc. May allocate a
240    * substantial amount of ram depending on the underlying files (10-20MB?).
241    *
242    * @param fs  The current file system to use.
243    * @param p  The path of the file.
244    * @param blockcache  <code>true</code> if the block cache is enabled.
245    * @param conf  The current configuration.
246    * @param cacheConf  The cache configuration and block cache reference.
247    * @param cfBloomType The bloom type to use for this store file as specified
248    *          by column family configuration. This may or may not be the same
249    *          as the Bloom filter type actually present in the HFile, because
250    *          column family configuration might change. If this is
251    *          {@link BloomType#NONE}, the existing Bloom filter is ignored.
252    * @param dataBlockEncoder data block encoding algorithm.
253    * @throws IOException When opening the reader fails.
254    */
255   public StoreFile(final FileSystem fs,
256             final Path p,
257             final Configuration conf,
258             final CacheConfig cacheConf,
259             final BloomType cfBloomType,
260             final HFileDataBlockEncoder dataBlockEncoder)
261       throws IOException {
262     this.fs = fs;
263     this.path = p;
264     this.cacheConf = cacheConf;
265     this.dataBlockEncoder =
266         dataBlockEncoder == null ? NoOpDataBlockEncoder.INSTANCE
267             : dataBlockEncoder;
268 
269     if (HFileLink.isHFileLink(p)) {
270       this.link = new HFileLink(conf, p);
271       LOG.debug("Store file " + p + " is a link");
272     } else if (isReference(p)) {
273       this.reference = Reference.read(fs, p);
274       this.referencePath = getReferredToFile(this.path);
275       if (HFileLink.isHFileLink(this.referencePath)) {
276         this.link = new HFileLink(conf, this.referencePath);
277       }
278       LOG.debug("Store file " + p + " is a " + reference.getFileRegion() +
279         " reference to " + this.referencePath);
280     } else if (!isHFile(p)) {
281       throw new IOException("path=" + path + " doesn't look like a valid StoreFile");
282     }
283 
284     if (BloomFilterFactory.isGeneralBloomEnabled(conf)) {
285       this.cfBloomType = cfBloomType;
286     } else {
287       LOG.info("Ignoring bloom filter check for file " + path + ": " +
288           "cfBloomType=" + cfBloomType + " (disabled in config)");
289       this.cfBloomType = BloomType.NONE;
290     }
291 
292     // cache the modification time stamp of this store file
293     FileStatus[] stats = FSUtils.listStatus(fs, p, null);
294     if (stats != null && stats.length == 1) {
295       this.modificationTimeStamp = stats[0].getModificationTime();
296     } else {
297       this.modificationTimeStamp = 0;
298     }
299 
300     SchemaMetrics.configureGlobally(conf);
301   }
302 
303   /**
304    * @return Path or null if this StoreFile was made with a Stream.
305    */
306   public Path getPath() {
307     return this.path;
308   }
309 
310   /**
311    * @return The Store/ColumnFamily this file belongs to.
312    */
313   byte [] getFamily() {
314     return Bytes.toBytes(this.path.getParent().getName());
315   }
316 
317   /**
318    * @return True if this is a StoreFile Reference; call after {@link #open()}
319    * else may get wrong answer.
320    */
321   boolean isReference() {
322     return this.reference != null;
323   }
324 
325   /**
326    * @return <tt>true</tt> if this StoreFile is an HFileLink
327    */
328   boolean isLink() {
329     return this.link != null && this.reference == null;
330   }
331 
332   private static boolean isHFile(final Path path) {
333     Matcher m = HFILE_NAME_PATTERN.matcher(path.getName());
334     return m.matches() && m.groupCount() > 0;
335   }
336 
337   /**
338    * @param p Path to check.
339    * @return True if the path has format of a HStoreFile reference.
340    */
341   public static boolean isReference(final Path p) {
342     return isReference(p.getName());
343   }
344 
345   /**
346    * @param name file name to check.
347    * @return True if the path has format of a HStoreFile reference.
348    */
349   public static boolean isReference(final String name) {
350     Matcher m = REF_NAME_PATTERN.matcher(name);
351     return m.matches() && m.groupCount() > 1;
352   }
353 
354   /*
355    * Return path to the file referred to by a Reference.  Presumes a directory
356    * hierarchy of <code>${hbase.rootdir}/tablename/regionname/familyname</code>.
357    * @param p Path to a Reference file.
358    * @return Calculated path to parent region file.
359    * @throws IllegalArgumentException when path regex fails to match.
360    */
361   public static Path getReferredToFile(final Path p) {
362     Matcher m = REF_NAME_PATTERN.matcher(p.getName());
363     if (m == null || !m.matches()) {
364       LOG.warn("Failed match of store file name " + p.toString());
365       throw new IllegalArgumentException("Failed match of store file name " +
366           p.toString());
367     }
368     // Other region name is suffix on the passed Reference file name
369     String otherRegion = m.group(2);
370     // Tabledir is up two directories from where Reference was written.
371     Path tableDir = p.getParent().getParent().getParent();
372     String nameStrippedOfSuffix = m.group(1);
373     LOG.debug("reference '" + p + "' to region=" + otherRegion + " hfile=" + nameStrippedOfSuffix);
374 
375     // Build up new path with the referenced region in place of our current
376     // region in the reference path.  Also strip regionname suffix from name.
377     return new Path(new Path(new Path(tableDir, otherRegion),
378       p.getParent().getName()), nameStrippedOfSuffix);
379   }
380 
381   /**
382    * @return True if this file was made by a major compaction.
383    */
384   boolean isMajorCompaction() {
385     if (this.majorCompaction == null) {
386       throw new NullPointerException("This has not been set yet");
387     }
388     return this.majorCompaction.get();
389   }
390 
391   /**
392    * @return True if this file should not be part of a minor compaction.
393    */
394   boolean excludeFromMinorCompaction() {
395     return this.excludeFromMinorCompaction;
396   }

398   /**
399    * @return This files maximum edit sequence id.
400    */
401   public long getMaxSequenceId() {
402     return this.sequenceid;
403   }
404 
405   public long getModificationTimeStamp() {
406     return modificationTimeStamp;
407   }
408 
409   /**
410    * Return the largest memstoreTS found across all storefiles in
411    * the given list. Store files that were created by a mapreduce
412    * bulk load are ignored, as they do not correspond to any specific
413    * put operation, and thus do not have a memstoreTS associated with them.
414    * @return 0 if no non-bulk-load files are provided or, this is Store that
415    * does not yet have any store files.
416    */
417   public static long getMaxMemstoreTSInList(Collection<StoreFile> sfs) {
418     long max = 0;
419     for (StoreFile sf : sfs) {
420       if (!sf.isBulkLoadResult()) {
421         max = Math.max(max, sf.getMaxMemstoreTS());
422       }
423     }
424     return max;
425   }
426 
427   /**
428    * Return the highest sequence ID found across all storefiles in
429    * the given list. Store files that were created by a mapreduce
430    * bulk load are ignored, as they do not correspond to any edit
431    * log items.
432    * @return 0 if no non-bulk-load files are provided or, this is Store that
433    * does not yet have any store files.
434    */
435   public static long getMaxSequenceIdInList(Collection<StoreFile> sfs) {
436     long max = 0;
437     for (StoreFile sf : sfs) {
438       if (!sf.isBulkLoadResult()) {
439         max = Math.max(max, sf.getMaxSequenceId());
440       }
441     }
442     return max;
443   }
444 
445   /**
446    * @return true if this storefile was created by HFileOutputFormat
447    * for a bulk load.
448    */
449   boolean isBulkLoadResult() {
450     return metadataMap.containsKey(BULKLOAD_TIME_KEY);
451   }
452 
453   /**
454    * Return the timestamp at which this bulk load file was generated.
455    */
456   public long getBulkLoadTimestamp() {
457     return Bytes.toLong(metadataMap.get(BULKLOAD_TIME_KEY));
458   }
459 
460   /**
461    * @return the cached value of HDFS blocks distribution. The cached value is
462    * calculated when store file is opened.
463    */
464   public HDFSBlocksDistribution getHDFSBlockDistribution() {
465     return this.hdfsBlocksDistribution;
466   }
467 
468   /**
469    * helper function to compute HDFS blocks distribution of a given reference
470    * file.For reference file, we don't compute the exact value. We use some
471    * estimate instead given it might be good enough. we assume bottom part
472    * takes the first half of reference file, top part takes the second half
473    * of the reference file. This is just estimate, given
474    * midkey ofregion != midkey of HFile, also the number and size of keys vary.
475    * If this estimate isn't good enough, we can improve it later.
476    * @param fs  The FileSystem
477    * @param reference  The reference
478    * @param status  The reference FileStatus
479    * @return HDFS blocks distribution
480    */
481   static private HDFSBlocksDistribution computeRefFileHDFSBlockDistribution(
482     FileSystem fs, Reference reference, FileStatus status) throws IOException {
483     if (status == null) {
484       return null;
485     }
486 
487     long start = 0;
488     long length = 0;
489 
490     if (Reference.isTopFileRegion(reference.getFileRegion())) {
491       start = status.getLen()/2;
492       length = status.getLen() - status.getLen()/2;
493     } else {
494       start = 0;
495       length = status.getLen()/2;
496     }
497     return FSUtils.computeHDFSBlocksDistribution(fs, status, start, length);
498   }
499 
500   /**
501    * compute HDFS block distribution, for reference file, it is an estimate
502    */
503   private void computeHDFSBlockDistribution() throws IOException {
504     if (isReference()) {
505       FileStatus status;
506       if (this.link != null) {
507         status = this.link.getFileStatus(fs);
508       } else {
509         status = fs.getFileStatus(this.referencePath);
510       }
511       this.hdfsBlocksDistribution = computeRefFileHDFSBlockDistribution(
512         this.fs, this.reference, status);
513     } else {
514       FileStatus status;
515       if (isLink()) {
516         status = link.getFileStatus(fs);
517       } else {
518         status = this.fs.getFileStatus(path);
519       }
520       long length = status.getLen();
521       this.hdfsBlocksDistribution = FSUtils.computeHDFSBlocksDistribution(
522         this.fs, status, 0, length);
523     }
524   }
525 
526   /**
527    * Opens reader on this store file.  Called by Constructor.
528    * @return Reader for the store file.
529    * @throws IOException
530    * @see #closeReader()
531    */
532   private Reader open() throws IOException {
533     if (this.reader != null) {
534       throw new IllegalAccessError("Already open");
535     }
536     if (isReference()) {
537       if (this.link != null) {
538         this.reader = new HalfStoreFileReader(this.fs, this.referencePath, this.link,
539           this.cacheConf, this.reference, dataBlockEncoder.getEncodingInCache());
540       } else {
541         this.reader = new HalfStoreFileReader(this.fs, this.referencePath,
542           this.cacheConf, this.reference, dataBlockEncoder.getEncodingInCache());
543       }
544     } else if (isLink()) {
545       long size = link.getFileStatus(fs).getLen();
546       this.reader = new Reader(this.fs, this.path, link, size, this.cacheConf,
547           dataBlockEncoder.getEncodingInCache(), true);
548     } else {
549       this.reader = new Reader(this.fs, this.path, this.cacheConf,
550           dataBlockEncoder.getEncodingInCache());
551     }
552 
553     if (isSchemaConfigured()) {
554       SchemaConfigured.resetSchemaMetricsConf(reader);
555       passSchemaMetricsTo(reader);
556     }
557 
558     computeHDFSBlockDistribution();
559 
560     // Load up indices and fileinfo. This also loads Bloom filter type.
561     metadataMap = Collections.unmodifiableMap(this.reader.loadFileInfo());
562 
563     // Read in our metadata.
564     byte [] b = metadataMap.get(MAX_SEQ_ID_KEY);
565     if (b != null) {
566       // By convention, if halfhfile, top half has a sequence number > bottom
567       // half. Thats why we add one in below. Its done for case the two halves
568       // are ever merged back together --rare.  Without it, on open of store,
569       // since store files are distinguished by sequence id, the one half would
570       // subsume the other.
571       this.sequenceid = Bytes.toLong(b);
572       if (isReference()) {
573         if (Reference.isTopFileRegion(this.reference.getFileRegion())) {
574           this.sequenceid += 1;
575         }
576       }
577     }
578     this.reader.setSequenceID(this.sequenceid);
579 
580     b = metadataMap.get(HFileWriterV2.MAX_MEMSTORE_TS_KEY);
581     if (b != null) {
582       this.maxMemstoreTS = Bytes.toLong(b);
583     }
584 
585     b = metadataMap.get(MAJOR_COMPACTION_KEY);
586     if (b != null) {
587       boolean mc = Bytes.toBoolean(b);
588       if (this.majorCompaction == null) {
589         this.majorCompaction = new AtomicBoolean(mc);
590       } else {
591         this.majorCompaction.set(mc);
592       }
593     } else {
594       // Presume it is not major compacted if it doesn't explicity say so
595       // HFileOutputFormat explicitly sets the major compacted key.
596       this.majorCompaction = new AtomicBoolean(false);
597     }
598 
599     b = metadataMap.get(EXCLUDE_FROM_MINOR_COMPACTION_KEY);
600     this.excludeFromMinorCompaction = (b != null && Bytes.toBoolean(b));
601 
602     BloomType hfileBloomType = reader.getBloomFilterType();
603     if (cfBloomType != BloomType.NONE) {
604       reader.loadBloomfilter(BlockType.GENERAL_BLOOM_META);
605       if (hfileBloomType != cfBloomType) {
606         LOG.info("HFile Bloom filter type for "
607             + reader.getHFileReader().getName() + ": " + hfileBloomType
608             + ", but " + cfBloomType + " specified in column family "
609             + "configuration");
610       }
611     } else if (hfileBloomType != BloomType.NONE) {
612       LOG.info("Bloom filter turned off by CF config for "
613           + reader.getHFileReader().getName());
614     }
615 
616     // load delete family bloom filter
617     reader.loadBloomfilter(BlockType.DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META);
618 
619     try {
620       byte [] timerangeBytes = metadataMap.get(TIMERANGE_KEY);
621       if (timerangeBytes != null) {
622         this.reader.timeRangeTracker = new TimeRangeTracker();
623         Writables.copyWritable(timerangeBytes, this.reader.timeRangeTracker);
624       }
625     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
626       LOG.error("Error reading timestamp range data from meta -- " +
627           "proceeding without", e);
628       this.reader.timeRangeTracker = null;
629     }
630     return this.reader;
631   }
632 
633   /**
634    * @return Reader for StoreFile. creates if necessary
635    * @throws IOException
636    */
637   public Reader createReader() throws IOException {
638     if (this.reader == null) {
639       try {
640         this.reader = open();
641       } catch (IOException e) {
642         try {
643           this.closeReader(true);
644         } catch (IOException ee) {              
645         }
646         throw e;
647       }
648 
649     }
650     return this.reader;
651   }
652 
653   /**
654    * @return Current reader.  Must call createReader first else returns null.
655    * @see #createReader()
656    */
657   public Reader getReader() {
658     return this.reader;
659   }
660 
661   /**
662    * @param evictOnClose whether to evict blocks belonging to this file
663    * @throws IOException
664    */
665   public synchronized void closeReader(boolean evictOnClose)
666       throws IOException {
667     if (this.reader != null) {
668       this.reader.close(evictOnClose);
669       this.reader = null;
670     }
671   }
672 
673   /**
674    * Delete this file
675    * @throws IOException
676    */
677   public void deleteReader() throws IOException {
678     closeReader(true);
679     HBaseFileSystem.deleteDirFromFileSystem(fs, getPath());
680   }
681 
682   @Override
683   public String toString() {
684     return this.path.toString() +
685       (isReference()? "-" + this.referencePath + "-" + reference.toString(): "");
686   }
687 
688   /**
689    * @return a length description of this StoreFile, suitable for debug output
690    */
691   public String toStringDetailed() {
692     StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
693     sb.append(this.path.toString());
694     sb.append(", isReference=").append(isReference());
695     sb.append(", isBulkLoadResult=").append(isBulkLoadResult());
696     if (isBulkLoadResult()) {
697       sb.append(", bulkLoadTS=").append(getBulkLoadTimestamp());
698     } else {
699       sb.append(", seqid=").append(getMaxSequenceId());
700     }
701     sb.append(", majorCompaction=").append(isMajorCompaction());
702 
703     return sb.toString();
704   }
705 
706   /**
707    * Utility to help with rename.
708    * @param fs
709    * @param src
710    * @param tgt
711    * @return True if succeeded.
712    * @throws IOException
713    */
714   public static Path rename(final FileSystem fs,
715                             final Path src,
716                             final Path tgt)
717       throws IOException {
718 
719     if (!fs.exists(src)) {
720       throw new FileNotFoundException(src.toString());
721     }
722     if (!HBaseFileSystem.renameDirForFileSystem(fs, src, tgt)) {
723       throw new IOException("Failed rename of " + src + " to " + tgt);
724     }
725     return tgt;
726   }
727 
728   public static class WriterBuilder {
729     private final Configuration conf;
730     private final CacheConfig cacheConf;
731     private final FileSystem fs;
732     private final int blockSize;
733 
734     private Compression.Algorithm compressAlgo =
735         HFile.DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_ALGORITHM;
736     private HFileDataBlockEncoder dataBlockEncoder =
737         NoOpDataBlockEncoder.INSTANCE;
738     private KeyValue.KVComparator comparator = KeyValue.COMPARATOR;
739     private BloomType bloomType = BloomType.NONE;
740     private long maxKeyCount = 0;
741     private Path dir;
742     private Path filePath;
743     private ChecksumType checksumType = HFile.DEFAULT_CHECKSUM_TYPE;
744     private int bytesPerChecksum = HFile.DEFAULT_BYTES_PER_CHECKSUM;
745 
746     public WriterBuilder(Configuration conf, CacheConfig cacheConf,
747         FileSystem fs, int blockSize) {
748       this.conf = conf;
749       this.cacheConf = cacheConf;
750       this.fs = fs;
751       this.blockSize = blockSize;
752     }
753 
754     /**
755      * Use either this method or {@link #withFilePath}, but not both.
756      * @param dir Path to column family directory. The directory is created if
757      *          does not exist. The file is given a unique name within this
758      *          directory.
759      * @return this (for chained invocation)
760      */
761     public WriterBuilder withOutputDir(Path dir) {
762       Preconditions.checkNotNull(dir);
763       this.dir = dir;
764       return this;
765     }
766 
767     /**
768      * Use either this method or {@link #withOutputDir}, but not both.
769      * @param filePath the StoreFile path to write
770      * @return this (for chained invocation)
771      */
772     public WriterBuilder withFilePath(Path filePath) {
773       Preconditions.checkNotNull(filePath);
774       this.filePath = filePath;
775       return this;
776     }
777 
778     public WriterBuilder withCompression(Compression.Algorithm compressAlgo) {
779       Preconditions.checkNotNull(compressAlgo);
780       this.compressAlgo = compressAlgo;
781       return this;
782     }
783 
784     public WriterBuilder withDataBlockEncoder(HFileDataBlockEncoder encoder) {
785       Preconditions.checkNotNull(encoder);
786       this.dataBlockEncoder = encoder;
787       return this;
788     }
789 
790     public WriterBuilder withComparator(KeyValue.KVComparator comparator) {
791       Preconditions.checkNotNull(comparator);
792       this.comparator = comparator;
793       return this;
794     }
795 
796     public WriterBuilder withBloomType(BloomType bloomType) {
797       Preconditions.checkNotNull(bloomType);
798       this.bloomType = bloomType;
799       return this;
800     }
801 
802     /**
803      * @param maxKeyCount estimated maximum number of keys we expect to add
804      * @return this (for chained invocation)
805      */
806     public WriterBuilder withMaxKeyCount(long maxKeyCount) {
807       this.maxKeyCount = maxKeyCount;
808       return this;
809     }
810 
811     /**
812      * @param checksumType the type of checksum
813      * @return this (for chained invocation)
814      */
815     public WriterBuilder withChecksumType(ChecksumType checksumType) {
816       this.checksumType = checksumType;
817       return this;
818     }
819 
820     /**
821      * @param bytesPerChecksum the number of bytes per checksum chunk
822      * @return this (for chained invocation)
823      */
824     public WriterBuilder withBytesPerChecksum(int bytesPerChecksum) {
825       this.bytesPerChecksum = bytesPerChecksum;
826       return this;
827     }
828 
829     /**
830      * Create a store file writer. Client is responsible for closing file when
831      * done. If metadata, add BEFORE closing using
832      * {@link Writer#appendMetadata}.
833      */
834     public Writer build() throws IOException {
835       if ((dir == null ? 0 : 1) + (filePath == null ? 0 : 1) != 1) {
836         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Either specify parent directory " +
837             "or file path");
838       }
839 
840       if (dir == null) {
841         dir = filePath.getParent();
842       }
843 
844       if (!fs.exists(dir)) {
845         HBaseFileSystem.makeDirOnFileSystem(fs, dir);
846       }
847 
848       if (filePath == null) {
849         filePath = getUniqueFile(fs, dir);
850         if (!BloomFilterFactory.isGeneralBloomEnabled(conf)) {
851           bloomType = BloomType.NONE;
852         }
853       }
854 
855       if (compressAlgo == null) {
856         compressAlgo = HFile.DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_ALGORITHM;
857       }
858       if (comparator == null) {
859         comparator = KeyValue.COMPARATOR;
860       }
861       return new Writer(fs, filePath, blockSize, compressAlgo, dataBlockEncoder,
862           conf, cacheConf, comparator, bloomType, maxKeyCount, checksumType,
863           bytesPerChecksum);
864     }
865   }
866 
867   /**
868    * @param fs
869    * @param dir Directory to create file in.
870    * @return random filename inside passed <code>dir</code>
871    */
872   public static Path getUniqueFile(final FileSystem fs, final Path dir)
873       throws IOException {
874     if (!fs.getFileStatus(dir).isDir()) {
875       throw new IOException("Expecting " + dir.toString() +
876         " to be a directory");
877     }
878     return getRandomFilename(fs, dir);
879   }
880 
881   /**
882    *
883    * @param fs
884    * @param dir
885    * @return Path to a file that doesn't exist at time of this invocation.
886    * @throws IOException
887    */
888   static Path getRandomFilename(final FileSystem fs, final Path dir)
889       throws IOException {
890     return getRandomFilename(fs, dir, null);
891   }
892 
893   /**
894    *
895    * @param fs
896    * @param dir
897    * @param suffix
898    * @return Path to a file that doesn't exist at time of this invocation.
899    * @throws IOException
900    */
901   static Path getRandomFilename(final FileSystem fs,
902                                 final Path dir,
903                                 final String suffix)
904       throws IOException {
905     return new Path(dir, UUID.randomUUID().toString().replaceAll("-", "")
906         + (suffix == null ? "" : suffix));
907   }
908 
909   /**
910    * Validate the store file name.
911    * @param fileName name of the file to validate
912    * @return <tt>true</tt> if the file could be a valid store file, <tt>false</tt> otherwise
913    */
914   public static boolean validateStoreFileName(String fileName) {
915     if (HFileLink.isHFileLink(fileName))
916       return true;
917     if (isReference(fileName))
918       return true;
919     return !fileName.contains("-");
920   }
921 
922   /**
923    * Write out a split reference. Package local so it doesnt leak out of
924    * regionserver.
925    * @param fs
926    * @param splitDir Presumes path format is actually
927    *          <code>SOME_DIRECTORY/REGIONNAME/FAMILY</code>.
928    * @param f File to split.
929    * @param splitRow
930    * @param range
931    * @return Path to created reference.
932    * @throws IOException
933    */
934   static Path split(final FileSystem fs,
935                     final Path splitDir,
936                     final StoreFile f,
937                     final byte [] splitRow,
938                     final Reference.Range range)
939       throws IOException {
940     // A reference to the bottom half of the hsf store file.
941     Reference r = new Reference(splitRow, range);
942     // Add the referred-to regions name as a dot separated suffix.
943     // See REF_NAME_REGEX regex above.  The referred-to regions name is
944     // up in the path of the passed in <code>f</code> -- parentdir is family,
945     // then the directory above is the region name.
946     String parentRegionName = f.getPath().getParent().getParent().getName();
947     // Write reference with same file id only with the other region name as
948     // suffix and into the new region location (under same family).
949     Path p = new Path(splitDir, f.getPath().getName() + "." + parentRegionName);
950     return r.write(fs, p);
951   }
952 
953 
954   /**
955    * A StoreFile writer.  Use this to read/write HBase Store Files. It is package
956    * local because it is an implementation detail of the HBase regionserver.
957    */
958   public static class Writer {
959     private final BloomFilterWriter generalBloomFilterWriter;
960     private final BloomFilterWriter deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter;
961     private final BloomType bloomType;
962     private byte[] lastBloomKey;
963     private int lastBloomKeyOffset, lastBloomKeyLen;
964     private KVComparator kvComparator;
965     private KeyValue lastKv = null;
966     private long earliestPutTs = HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP;
967     private KeyValue lastDeleteFamilyKV = null;
968     private long deleteFamilyCnt = 0;
969 
970     protected HFileDataBlockEncoder dataBlockEncoder;
971 
972     /** Checksum type */
973     protected ChecksumType checksumType;
974 
975     /** Bytes per Checksum */
976     protected int bytesPerChecksum;
977     
978     TimeRangeTracker timeRangeTracker = new TimeRangeTracker();
979     /* isTimeRangeTrackerSet keeps track if the timeRange has already been set
980      * When flushing a memstore, we set TimeRange and use this variable to
981      * indicate that it doesn't need to be calculated again while
982      * appending KeyValues.
983      * It is not set in cases of compactions when it is recalculated using only
984      * the appended KeyValues*/
985     boolean isTimeRangeTrackerSet = false;
986 
987     protected HFile.Writer writer;
988 
989     /**
990      * Creates an HFile.Writer that also write helpful meta data.
991      * @param fs file system to write to
992      * @param path file name to create
993      * @param blocksize HDFS block size
994      * @param compress HDFS block compression
995      * @param conf user configuration
996      * @param comparator key comparator
997      * @param bloomType bloom filter setting
998      * @param maxKeys the expected maximum number of keys to be added. Was used
999      *        for Bloom filter size in {@link HFile} format version 1.
1000      * @param checksumType the checksum type
1001      * @param bytesPerChecksum the number of bytes per checksum value
1002      * @throws IOException problem writing to FS
1003      */
1004     private Writer(FileSystem fs, Path path, int blocksize,
1005         Compression.Algorithm compress,
1006         HFileDataBlockEncoder dataBlockEncoder, final Configuration conf,
1007         CacheConfig cacheConf,
1008         final KVComparator comparator, BloomType bloomType, long maxKeys,
1009         final ChecksumType checksumType, final int bytesPerChecksum)
1010         throws IOException {
1011       this.dataBlockEncoder = dataBlockEncoder != null ?
1012           dataBlockEncoder : NoOpDataBlockEncoder.INSTANCE;
1013       writer = HFile.getWriterFactory(conf, cacheConf)
1014           .withPath(fs, path)
1015           .withBlockSize(blocksize)
1016           .withCompression(compress)
1017           .withDataBlockEncoder(dataBlockEncoder)
1018           .withComparator(comparator.getRawComparator())
1019           .withChecksumType(checksumType)
1020           .withBytesPerChecksum(bytesPerChecksum)
1021           .create();
1022 
1023       this.kvComparator = comparator;
1024 
1025       generalBloomFilterWriter = BloomFilterFactory.createGeneralBloomAtWrite(
1026           conf, cacheConf, bloomType,
1027           (int) Math.min(maxKeys, Integer.MAX_VALUE), writer);
1028 
1029       if (generalBloomFilterWriter != null) {
1030         this.bloomType = bloomType;
1031         LOG.info("Bloom filter type for " + path + ": " + this.bloomType + ", "
1032             + generalBloomFilterWriter.getClass().getSimpleName());
1033       } else {
1034         // Not using Bloom filters.
1035         this.bloomType = BloomType.NONE;
1036       }
1037 
1038       // initialize delete family Bloom filter when there is NO RowCol Bloom
1039       // filter
1040       if (this.bloomType != BloomType.ROWCOL) {
1041         this.deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter = BloomFilterFactory
1042             .createDeleteBloomAtWrite(conf, cacheConf,
1043                 (int) Math.min(maxKeys, Integer.MAX_VALUE), writer);
1044       } else {
1045         deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter = null;
1046       }
1047       if (deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter != null) {
1048         LOG.info("Delete Family Bloom filter type for " + path + ": "
1049             + deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter.getClass().getSimpleName());
1050       }
1051       this.checksumType = checksumType;
1052       this.bytesPerChecksum = bytesPerChecksum;
1053     }
1054 
1055     /**
1056      * Writes meta data.
1057      * Call before {@link #close()} since its written as meta data to this file.
1058      * @param maxSequenceId Maximum sequence id.
1059      * @param majorCompaction True if this file is product of a major compaction
1060      * @throws IOException problem writing to FS
1061      */
1062     public void appendMetadata(final long maxSequenceId, final boolean majorCompaction)
1063     throws IOException {
1064       writer.appendFileInfo(MAX_SEQ_ID_KEY, Bytes.toBytes(maxSequenceId));
1065       writer.appendFileInfo(MAJOR_COMPACTION_KEY,
1066           Bytes.toBytes(majorCompaction));
1067       appendTrackedTimestampsToMetadata();
1068     }
1069 
1070     /**
1071      * Add TimestampRange and earliest put timestamp to Metadata
1072      */
1073     public void appendTrackedTimestampsToMetadata() throws IOException {
1074       appendFileInfo(TIMERANGE_KEY,WritableUtils.toByteArray(timeRangeTracker));
1075       appendFileInfo(EARLIEST_PUT_TS, Bytes.toBytes(earliestPutTs));
1076     }
1077 
1078     /**
1079      * Set TimeRangeTracker
1080      * @param trt
1081      */
1082     public void setTimeRangeTracker(final TimeRangeTracker trt) {
1083       this.timeRangeTracker = trt;
1084       isTimeRangeTrackerSet = true;
1085     }
1086 
1087     /**
1088      * Record the earlest Put timestamp.
1089      *
1090      * If the timeRangeTracker is not set,
1091      * update TimeRangeTracker to include the timestamp of this key
1092      * @param kv
1093      */
1094     public void trackTimestamps(final KeyValue kv) {
1095       if (KeyValue.Type.Put.getCode() == kv.getType()) {
1096         earliestPutTs = Math.min(earliestPutTs, kv.getTimestamp());
1097       }
1098       if (!isTimeRangeTrackerSet) {
1099         timeRangeTracker.includeTimestamp(kv);
1100       }
1101     }
1102 
1103     private void appendGeneralBloomfilter(final KeyValue kv) throws IOException {
1104       if (this.generalBloomFilterWriter != null) {
1105         // only add to the bloom filter on a new, unique key
1106         boolean newKey = true;
1107         if (this.lastKv != null) {
1108           switch(bloomType) {
1109           case ROW:
1110             newKey = ! kvComparator.matchingRows(kv, lastKv);
1111             break;
1112           case ROWCOL:
1113             newKey = ! kvComparator.matchingRowColumn(kv, lastKv);
1114             break;
1115           case NONE:
1116             newKey = false;
1117             break;
1118           default:
1119             throw new IOException("Invalid Bloom filter type: " + bloomType +
1120                 " (ROW or ROWCOL expected)");
1121           }
1122         }
1123         if (newKey) {
1124           /*
1125            * http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_Cib_A77V54U/StZMrzaKufI/AAAAAAAAADo/ZhK7bGoJdMQ/s400/KeyValue.png
1126            * Key = RowLen + Row + FamilyLen + Column [Family + Qualifier] + TimeStamp
1127            *
1128            * 2 Types of Filtering:
1129            *  1. Row = Row
1130            *  2. RowCol = Row + Qualifier
1131            */
1132           byte[] bloomKey;
1133           int bloomKeyOffset, bloomKeyLen;
1134 
1135           switch (bloomType) {
1136           case ROW:
1137             bloomKey = kv.getBuffer();
1138             bloomKeyOffset = kv.getRowOffset();
1139             bloomKeyLen = kv.getRowLength();
1140             break;
1141           case ROWCOL:
1142             // merge(row, qualifier)
1143             // TODO: could save one buffer copy in case of compound Bloom
1144             // filters when this involves creating a KeyValue
1145             bloomKey = generalBloomFilterWriter.createBloomKey(kv.getBuffer(),
1146                 kv.getRowOffset(), kv.getRowLength(), kv.getBuffer(),
1147                 kv.getQualifierOffset(), kv.getQualifierLength());
1148             bloomKeyOffset = 0;
1149             bloomKeyLen = bloomKey.length;
1150             break;
1151           default:
1152             throw new IOException("Invalid Bloom filter type: " + bloomType +
1153                 " (ROW or ROWCOL expected)");
1154           }
1155           generalBloomFilterWriter.add(bloomKey, bloomKeyOffset, bloomKeyLen);
1156           if (lastBloomKey != null
1157               && generalBloomFilterWriter.getComparator().compare(bloomKey,
1158                   bloomKeyOffset, bloomKeyLen, lastBloomKey,
1159                   lastBloomKeyOffset, lastBloomKeyLen) <= 0) {
1160             throw new IOException("Non-increasing Bloom keys: "
1161                 + Bytes.toStringBinary(bloomKey, bloomKeyOffset, bloomKeyLen)
1162                 + " after "
1163                 + Bytes.toStringBinary(lastBloomKey, lastBloomKeyOffset,
1164                     lastBloomKeyLen));
1165           }
1166           lastBloomKey = bloomKey;
1167           lastBloomKeyOffset = bloomKeyOffset;
1168           lastBloomKeyLen = bloomKeyLen;
1169           this.lastKv = kv;
1170         }
1171       }
1172     }
1173 
1174     private void appendDeleteFamilyBloomFilter(final KeyValue kv)
1175         throws IOException {
1176       if (!kv.isDeleteFamily()) {
1177         return;
1178       }
1179 
1180       // increase the number of delete family in the store file
1181       deleteFamilyCnt++;
1182       if (null != this.deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter) {
1183         boolean newKey = true;
1184         if (lastDeleteFamilyKV != null) {
1185           newKey = !kvComparator.matchingRows(kv, lastDeleteFamilyKV);
1186         }
1187         if (newKey) {
1188           this.deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter.add(kv.getBuffer(),
1189               kv.getRowOffset(), kv.getRowLength());
1190           this.lastDeleteFamilyKV = kv;
1191         }
1192       }
1193     }
1194 
1195     public void append(final KeyValue kv) throws IOException {
1196       appendGeneralBloomfilter(kv);
1197       appendDeleteFamilyBloomFilter(kv);
1198       writer.append(kv);
1199       trackTimestamps(kv);
1200     }
1201 
1202     public Path getPath() {
1203       return this.writer.getPath();
1204     }
1205 
1206     boolean hasGeneralBloom() {
1207       return this.generalBloomFilterWriter != null;
1208     }
1209 
1210     /**
1211      * For unit testing only.
1212      *
1213      * @return the Bloom filter used by this writer.
1214      */
1215     BloomFilterWriter getGeneralBloomWriter() {
1216       return generalBloomFilterWriter;
1217     }
1218 
1219     private boolean closeBloomFilter(BloomFilterWriter bfw) throws IOException {
1220       boolean haveBloom = (bfw != null && bfw.getKeyCount() > 0);
1221       if (haveBloom) {
1222         bfw.compactBloom();
1223       }
1224       return haveBloom;
1225     }
1226 
1227     private boolean closeGeneralBloomFilter() throws IOException {
1228       boolean hasGeneralBloom = closeBloomFilter(generalBloomFilterWriter);
1229 
1230       // add the general Bloom filter writer and append file info
1231       if (hasGeneralBloom) {
1232         writer.addGeneralBloomFilter(generalBloomFilterWriter);
1233         writer.appendFileInfo(BLOOM_FILTER_TYPE_KEY,
1234             Bytes.toBytes(bloomType.toString()));
1235         if (lastBloomKey != null) {
1236           writer.appendFileInfo(LAST_BLOOM_KEY, Arrays.copyOfRange(
1237               lastBloomKey, lastBloomKeyOffset, lastBloomKeyOffset
1238                   + lastBloomKeyLen));
1239         }
1240       }
1241       return hasGeneralBloom;
1242     }
1243 
1244     private boolean closeDeleteFamilyBloomFilter() throws IOException {
1245       boolean hasDeleteFamilyBloom = closeBloomFilter(deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter);
1246 
1247       // add the delete family Bloom filter writer
1248       if (hasDeleteFamilyBloom) {
1249         writer.addDeleteFamilyBloomFilter(deleteFamilyBloomFilterWriter);
1250       }
1251 
1252       // append file info about the number of delete family kvs
1253       // even if there is no delete family Bloom.
1254       writer.appendFileInfo(DELETE_FAMILY_COUNT,
1255           Bytes.toBytes(this.deleteFamilyCnt));
1256 
1257       return hasDeleteFamilyBloom;
1258     }
1259 
1260     public void close() throws IOException {
1261       boolean hasGeneralBloom = this.closeGeneralBloomFilter();
1262       boolean hasDeleteFamilyBloom = this.closeDeleteFamilyBloomFilter();
1263 
1264       writer.close();
1265 
1266       // Log final Bloom filter statistics. This needs to be done after close()
1267       // because compound Bloom filters might be finalized as part of closing.
1268       StoreFile.LOG.info((hasGeneralBloom ? "" : "NO ") + "General Bloom and "
1269           + (hasDeleteFamilyBloom ? "" : "NO ") + "DeleteFamily"
1270           + " was added to HFile (" + getPath() + ") ");
1271 
1272     }
1273 
1274     public void appendFileInfo(byte[] key, byte[] value) throws IOException {
1275       writer.appendFileInfo(key, value);
1276     }
1277 
1278     /** For use in testing, e.g. {@link CreateRandomStoreFile} */
1279     HFile.Writer getHFileWriter() {
1280       return writer;
1281     }
1282   }
1283 
1284   /**
1285    * Reader for a StoreFile.
1286    */
1287   public static class Reader extends SchemaConfigured {
1288     static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(Reader.class.getName());
1289 
1290     protected BloomFilter generalBloomFilter = null;
1291     protected BloomFilter deleteFamilyBloomFilter = null;
1292     protected BloomType bloomFilterType;
1293     private final HFile.Reader reader;
1294     protected TimeRangeTracker timeRangeTracker = null;
1295     protected long sequenceID = -1;
1296     private byte[] lastBloomKey;
1297     private long deleteFamilyCnt = -1;
1298 
1299     public Reader(FileSystem fs, Path path, CacheConfig cacheConf,
1300         DataBlockEncoding preferredEncodingInCache) throws IOException {
1301       super(path);
1302       reader = HFile.createReaderWithEncoding(fs, path, cacheConf,
1303           preferredEncodingInCache);
1304       bloomFilterType = BloomType.NONE;
1305     }
1306 
1307     public Reader(FileSystem fs, Path path, HFileLink hfileLink, long size,
1308         CacheConfig cacheConf, DataBlockEncoding preferredEncodingInCache,
1309         boolean closeIStream) throws IOException {
1310       super(path);
1311 
1312       FSDataInputStream in = hfileLink.open(fs);
1313       FSDataInputStream inNoChecksum = in;
1314       if (fs instanceof HFileSystem) {
1315         FileSystem noChecksumFs = ((HFileSystem)fs).getNoChecksumFs();
1316         inNoChecksum = hfileLink.open(noChecksumFs);
1317       }
1318 
1319       reader = HFile.createReaderWithEncoding(fs, path, in, inNoChecksum,
1320                   size, cacheConf, preferredEncodingInCache, closeIStream);
1321       bloomFilterType = BloomType.NONE;
1322     }
1323 
1324     /**
1325      * ONLY USE DEFAULT CONSTRUCTOR FOR UNIT TESTS
1326      */
1327     Reader() {
1328       this.reader = null;
1329     }
1330 
1331     public RawComparator<byte []> getComparator() {
1332       return reader.getComparator();

1401     /**
1402      * Check if this storeFile may contain keys within the TimeRange that
1403      * have not expired (i.e. not older than oldestUnexpiredTS).
1404      * @param scan the current scan
1405      * @param oldestUnexpiredTS the oldest timestamp that is not expired, as
1406      *          determined by the column family's TTL
1407      * @return false if queried keys definitely don't exist in this StoreFile
1408      */
1409     boolean passesTimerangeFilter(Scan scan, long oldestUnexpiredTS) {
1410       if (timeRangeTracker == null) {
1411         return true;
1412       } else {
1413         return timeRangeTracker.includesTimeRange(scan.getTimeRange()) &&
1414             timeRangeTracker.getMaximumTimestamp() >= oldestUnexpiredTS;
1415       }
1416     }
1417 
1418     /**
1419      * Checks whether the given scan passes the Bloom filter (if present). Only
1420      * checks Bloom filters for single-row or single-row-column scans. Bloom
1421      * filter checking for multi-gets is implemented as part of the store
1422      * scanner system (see {@link StoreFileScanner#seekExactly}) and uses
1423      * the lower-level API {@link #passesGeneralBloomFilter(byte[], int, int, byte[],
1424      * int, int)}.
1425      *
1426      * @param scan the scan specification. Used to determine the row, and to
1427      *          check whether this is a single-row ("get") scan.
1428      * @param columns the set of columns. Only used for row-column Bloom
1429      *          filters.
1430      * @return true if the scan with the given column set passes the Bloom
1431      *         filter, or if the Bloom filter is not applicable for the scan.
1432      *         False if the Bloom filter is applicable and the scan fails it.
1433      */
1434      boolean passesBloomFilter(Scan scan,
1435         final SortedSet<byte[]> columns) {
1436       // Multi-column non-get scans will use Bloom filters through the
1437       // lower-level API function that this function calls.
1438       if (!scan.isGetScan()) {
1439         return true;
1440       }
1441 
1442       byte[] row = scan.getStartRow();
1443       switch (this.bloomFilterType) {
1444         case ROW:
1445           return passesGeneralBloomFilter(row, 0, row.length, null, 0, 0);
1446 
1447         case ROWCOL:
1448           if (columns != null && columns.size() == 1) {
1449             byte[] column = columns.first();
1450             return passesGeneralBloomFilter(row, 0, row.length, column, 0,
1451                 column.length);
1452           }
1453 
1454           // For multi-column queries the Bloom filter is checked from the
1455           // seekExact operation.
1456           return true;
1457 
1458         default:
1459           return true;
1460       }
1461     }
1462 
1463     public boolean passesDeleteFamilyBloomFilter(byte[] row, int rowOffset,
1464         int rowLen) {
1465       // Cache Bloom filter as a local variable in case it is set to null by
1466       // another thread on an IO error.
1467       BloomFilter bloomFilter = this.deleteFamilyBloomFilter;
1468 
1469       // Empty file or there is no delete family at all
1470       if (reader.getTrailer().getEntryCount() == 0 || deleteFamilyCnt == 0) {
1471         return false;
1472       }
1473 
1474       if (bloomFilter == null) {
1475         return true;
1476       }
1477 
1478       try {
1479         if (!bloomFilter.supportsAutoLoading()) {
1480           return true;
1481         }
1482         return bloomFilter.contains(row, rowOffset, rowLen, null);
1483       } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
1484         LOG.error("Bad Delete Family bloom filter data -- proceeding without",
1485             e);
1486         setDeleteFamilyBloomFilterFaulty();
1487       }
1488 
1489       return true;
1490     }
1491 
1492     /**
1493      * A method for checking Bloom filters. Called directly from
1494      * StoreFileScanner in case of a multi-column query.
1495      *
1496      * @param row
1497      * @param rowOffset
1498      * @param rowLen
1499      * @param col
1500      * @param colOffset
1501      * @param colLen
1502      * @return True if passes
1503      */
1504     public boolean passesGeneralBloomFilter(byte[] row, int rowOffset,
1505         int rowLen, byte[] col, int colOffset, int colLen) {
1506       if (generalBloomFilter == null)
1507         return true;
1508 
1509       byte[] key;
1510       switch (bloomFilterType) {
1511         case ROW:
1512           if (col != null) {
1513             throw new RuntimeException("Row-only Bloom filter called with " +
1514                 "column specified");
1515           }
1516           if (rowOffset != 0 || rowLen != row.length) {
1517               throw new AssertionError("For row-only Bloom filters the row "
1518                   + "must occupy the whole array");
1519           }
1520           key = row;
1521           break;
1522 
1523         case ROWCOL:
1524           key = generalBloomFilter.createBloomKey(row, rowOffset, rowLen, col,
1525               colOffset, colLen);
1526           break;
1527 
1528         default:
1529           return true;
1530       }
1531 
1532       // Cache Bloom filter as a local variable in case it is set to null by
1533       // another thread on an IO error.
1534       BloomFilter bloomFilter = this.generalBloomFilter;
1535 
1536       if (bloomFilter == null) {
1537         return true;
1538       }
1539 
1540       // Empty file
1541       if (reader.getTrailer().getEntryCount() == 0)
1542         return false;
1543 
1544       try {
1545         boolean shouldCheckBloom;
1546         ByteBuffer bloom;
1547         if (bloomFilter.supportsAutoLoading()) {
1548           bloom = null;
1549           shouldCheckBloom = true;
1550         } else {
1551           bloom = reader.getMetaBlock(HFileWriterV1.BLOOM_FILTER_DATA_KEY,
1552               true);
1553           shouldCheckBloom = bloom != null;
1554         }
1555 
1556         if (shouldCheckBloom) {
1557           boolean exists;
1558 
1559           // Whether the primary Bloom key is greater than the last Bloom key
1560           // from the file info. For row-column Bloom filters this is not yet
1561           // a sufficient condition to return false.
1562           boolean keyIsAfterLast = lastBloomKey != null
1563               && bloomFilter.getComparator().compare(key, lastBloomKey) > 0;
1564 
1565           if (bloomFilterType == BloomType.ROWCOL) {
1566             // Since a Row Delete is essentially a DeleteFamily applied to all
1567             // columns, a file might be skipped if using row+col Bloom filter.
1568             // In order to ensure this file is included an additional check is
1569             // required looking only for a row bloom.
1570             byte[] rowBloomKey = bloomFilter.createBloomKey(row, 0, row.length,
1571                 null, 0, 0);
1572 
1573             if (keyIsAfterLast
1574                 && bloomFilter.getComparator().compare(rowBloomKey,
1575                     lastBloomKey) > 0) {
1576               exists = false;
1577             } else {
1578               exists =
1579                   bloomFilter.contains(key, 0, key.length, bloom) ||
1580                   bloomFilter.contains(rowBloomKey, 0, rowBloomKey.length,
1581                       bloom);
1582             }
1583           } else {
1584             exists = !keyIsAfterLast
1585                 && bloomFilter.contains(key, 0, key.length, bloom);
1586           }
1587 
1588           getSchemaMetrics().updateBloomMetrics(exists);
1589           return exists;
1590         }
1591       } catch (IOException e) {
1592         LOG.error("Error reading bloom filter data -- proceeding without",
1593             e);
1594         setGeneralBloomFilterFaulty();
1595       } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
1596         LOG.error("Bad bloom filter data -- proceeding without", e);
1597         setGeneralBloomFilterFaulty();
1598       }
1599 
1600       return true;
1601     }
1602 
1603     public Map<byte[], byte[]> loadFileInfo() throws IOException {
1604       Map<byte [], byte []> fi = reader.loadFileInfo();
1605 
1606       byte[] b = fi.get(BLOOM_FILTER_TYPE_KEY);
1607       if (b != null) {
1608         bloomFilterType = BloomType.valueOf(Bytes.toString(b));
1609       }
1610 
1611       lastBloomKey = fi.get(LAST_BLOOM_KEY);
1612       byte[] cnt = fi.get(DELETE_FAMILY_COUNT);
1613       if (cnt != null) {
1614         deleteFamilyCnt = Bytes.toLong(cnt);
1615       }
1616 
1617       return fi;
1618     }
1619 
1620     public void loadBloomfilter() {
1621       this.loadBloomfilter(BlockType.GENERAL_BLOOM_META);
1622       this.loadBloomfilter(BlockType.DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META);
1623     }
1624 
1625     private void loadBloomfilter(BlockType blockType) {
1626       try {
1627         if (blockType == BlockType.GENERAL_BLOOM_META) {
1628           if (this.generalBloomFilter != null)
1629             return; // Bloom has been loaded
1630 
1631           DataInput bloomMeta = reader.getGeneralBloomFilterMetadata();
1632           if (bloomMeta != null) {
1633             // sanity check for NONE Bloom filter
1634             if (bloomFilterType == BloomType.NONE) {
1635               throw new IOException(
1636                   "valid bloom filter type not found in FileInfo");
1637             } else {
1638               generalBloomFilter = BloomFilterFactory.createFromMeta(bloomMeta,
1639                   reader);
1640               LOG.info("Loaded " + bloomFilterType.toString() + " ("
1641                   + generalBloomFilter.getClass().getSimpleName()
1642                   + ") metadata for " + reader.getName());
1643             }
1644           }
1645         } else if (blockType == BlockType.DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META) {
1646           if (this.deleteFamilyBloomFilter != null)
1647             return; // Bloom has been loaded
1648 
1649           DataInput bloomMeta = reader.getDeleteBloomFilterMetadata();
1650           if (bloomMeta != null) {
1651             deleteFamilyBloomFilter = BloomFilterFactory.createFromMeta(
1652                 bloomMeta, reader);
1653             LOG.info("Loaded Delete Family Bloom ("
1654                 + deleteFamilyBloomFilter.getClass().getSimpleName()
1655                 + ") metadata for " + reader.getName());
1656           }
1657         } else {
1658           throw new RuntimeException("Block Type: " + blockType.toString()
1659               + "is not supported for Bloom filter");
1660         }
1661       } catch (IOException e) {
1662         LOG.error("Error reading bloom filter meta for " + blockType
1663             + " -- proceeding without", e);
1664         setBloomFilterFaulty(blockType);
1665       } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
1666         LOG.error("Bad bloom filter meta " + blockType
1667             + " -- proceeding without", e);
1668         setBloomFilterFaulty(blockType);
1669       }
1670     }
1671 
1672     private void setBloomFilterFaulty(BlockType blockType) {
1673       if (blockType == BlockType.GENERAL_BLOOM_META) {
1674         setGeneralBloomFilterFaulty();
1675       } else if (blockType == BlockType.DELETE_FAMILY_BLOOM_META) {
1676         setDeleteFamilyBloomFilterFaulty();
1677       }
1678     }

1680     /**
1681      * The number of Bloom filter entries in this store file, or an estimate
1682      * thereof, if the Bloom filter is not loaded. This always returns an upper
1683      * bound of the number of Bloom filter entries.
1684      *
1685      * @return an estimate of the number of Bloom filter entries in this file
1686      */
1687     public long getFilterEntries() {
1688       return generalBloomFilter != null ? generalBloomFilter.getKeyCount()
1689           : reader.getEntries();
1690     }

1784 
1785   /**
1786    * Useful comparators for comparing StoreFiles.
1787    */
1788   abstract static class Comparators {
1789     /**
1790      * Comparator that compares based on the flush time of
1791      * the StoreFiles. All bulk loads are placed before all non-
1792      * bulk loads, and then all files are sorted by sequence ID.
1793      * If there are ties, the path name is used as a tie-breaker.
1794      */
1795     static final Comparator<StoreFile> FLUSH_TIME =
1796       Ordering.compound(ImmutableList.of(
1797           Ordering.natural().onResultOf(new GetBulkTime()),
1798           Ordering.natural().onResultOf(new GetSeqId()),
1799           Ordering.natural().onResultOf(new GetPathName())
1800       ));
1801 
1802     private static class GetBulkTime implements Function<StoreFile, Long> {
1803       @Override
1804       public Long apply(StoreFile sf) {
1805         if (!sf.isBulkLoadResult()) return Long.MAX_VALUE;
1806         return sf.getBulkLoadTimestamp();
1807       }
1808     }
1809     private static class GetSeqId implements Function<StoreFile, Long> {
1810       @Override
1811       public Long apply(StoreFile sf) {
1812         if (sf.isBulkLoadResult()) return -1L;
1813         return sf.getMaxSequenceId();
1814       }
1815     }
1816     private static class GetPathName implements Function<StoreFile, String> {
1817       @Override
1818       public String apply(StoreFile sf) {
1819         return sf.getPath().getName();
1820       }
1821     }
1822 
1823     /**
1824      * FILE_SIZE = descending sort StoreFiles (largest --> smallest in size)
1825      */
1826     static final Comparator<StoreFile> FILE_SIZE =
1827       Ordering.natural().reverse().onResultOf(new Function<StoreFile, Long>() {
1828         @Override
1829         public Long apply(StoreFile sf) {
1830           return sf.getReader().length();
1831         }
1832       });
1833   }
1834 }
